name: MPGS NodeJS example
description: A basic example of MPGS features in NodeJS for Tyro merchants

USERNAME.description: Your TEST Gateway merchant ID (must begin with 'TEST')

TEST_GATEWAY_URL.description: The Gateway base URL to target. Use your region specific url if you have one.

WEBHOOKS_NOTIFICATION_SECRET.description: Webhook notification secret for payload validation

IS_CERT_AUTH_ENABLED.description: should be FALSE while running TEST_GATEWAY
